definition: abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])

sentences.english: Different teams work on the Bolivia site and the Brazil site.
sentences.chinese: 玻利维亚站点和巴西站点由不同的团队负责。

sentences.english: Laura Zúñiga said they were “going shopping” in Bolivia and Colombia.
sentences.chinese: 劳拉说他们正“准备去玻利维亚和哥伦比亚购物”。

sentences.english: Welcome to the delirious world of Bolivian wrestling.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎来到玻利维亚摔跤这个狂热的世界。

sentences.english: Some dams will be in Peruvian and Bolivia parts of the jungle.
sentences.chinese: 部分水坝将在雨林位于秘鲁和玻利维亚的地区修建。

sentences.english: Licancabur volcano is located on the border between Chile and Bolivia.
sentences.chinese: 位于智利与玻利维亚边境的利坎卡武尔火山。

sentences.english: A Bolivian chemist displays a small amount of lithium carbonate.�
sentences.chinese: 一位玻利维亚化学家正在展示提取出来的少量碳酸锂。

sentences.english: Rich countries would no longer plunder Bolivia's resources.
sentences.chinese: 发达国家将再也不能掠夺玻利维亚的资源。

sentences.english: According to media reports, the Bolivian Defense Minister Ruben?
sentences.chinese: 据媒体报道，玻利维亚国防部长鲁文？

sentences.english: State-employed miners participate in a protest in La Paz October 10, 2006.
sentences.chinese: 国营矿工参加玻利维亚首都拉巴斯的抗议。

sentences.english: The Bolivian flag flies over equipment on the salt flats.
sentences.chinese: 盐沼中的机器设备上有玻利维亚国旗在飘扬。

sentences.english: More than half the world’s lithium reserves lie in Bolivia and Chile.
sentences.chinese: 玻利维亚和智利的锂储量占全世界储量一半多。

sentences.english: Photo by:Maria Stenzel Chipaya Hair Braiding, Bolivia, 1999
sentences.chinese: 支帕亚族的发辫编织，玻利维亚，1999。

sentences.english: Butterfly and Trees, Madidi National Park, Bolivia.
sentences.chinese: 蝴蝶和树，马迪迪国家公园，玻利维亚。

definition: Guatemala/see also 瓜地馬拉|瓜地马拉[Gua1 di4 ma3 la1]

pinyin: Duo1 mi3 ni2 jia1 Gong4 he2 guo2

definition: La Paz, administrative capital of Bolivia
